entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 20. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 20. Wind chill near minus 33. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 18. POP 40%
